import { memo, useContext, useState } from 'react' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/Photo' import { CommonDataForAllViewService } from '../ViewInformationDetailService' import './ViewPhotos.scss' function ViewPhotos({ languageSelected }) { let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const service = useContext(CommonDataForAllViewService) const [imageFullView, setImageFullView] = useState() console.log('imageFullView', imageFullView) return ( <> {imageFullView &&
}
{[...service.receptionHallPhoto].map((img) => (
setImageFullView(img)} src={URL.createObjectURL(img)} />
))}
{[...service.outdoorPhoto].map((img) => (
setImageFullView(img)} className="image-selected cursor-pointer" src={URL.createObjectURL(img)} />
))}
{[...service.otherPhoto].map((img) => (
setImageFullView(img)} className="image-selected cursor-pointer" src={URL.createObjectURL(img)} />
))}
) } export default memo(ViewPhotos)
